abstractContent.text: FrameNet is the ideal resource for representation as linked data, and several renderings of the resource in RDF/OWL have been created.
FrameNet has also been and continues to be linked to other major resources, including WordNet, BabelNet, and MASC, in the Linguistic Linked Open Data cloud.

Although so far the supporting technologies have not enabled easy and widespread access to the envisioned massive network of language resources, a con-flation of recent efforts suggests this maybe a reality in the not-too-distant future.
